org.zaproxy.zap.junit

Class WebSocketsTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.junit.BaseZapProxyTest
      • org.zaproxy.zap.junit.WebSocketsTest

  • public class WebSocketsTest
extends BaseZapProxyTest
    This test uses the Echo Server from websockets.org for testing a valid WebSockets connection.
